thread.title: This Video Of Kareena Kapoor Khan And Shahid Kapoor Dancing Together Is The Ultimate Throwback
thread.title_full: This Video Of Kareena Kapoor Khan And Shahid Kapoor Dancing Together Is The Ultimate Throwback

title: This Video Of Kareena Kapoor Khan And Shahid Kapoor Dancing Together Is The Ultimate Throwback
text:
facebook 708 SHARES 
While we are totally in love with Shahid-Mira-Misha, and Kareena-Saif-Taimur we cannot really get over Bebo and Shahid's amazing chemistry back in the day. The two dated for quite a few years till they parted ways, a decade ago, right before the release of Jab We Met . 
So, you can imagine our happiness when we came across a super old video of the two dancing to the tunes of Mujhe Shaadi Karogi . Perfect üëåüèºüòçüòÇ #thorowüîô #shahidkapoor #kareenakapoor #salmankhan #johnabraham @shahidkapoor @beingsalmankhan @thejohnabraham A post shared by Shahid'sTurkishFan (@pyarshasha) on Nov 11, 2016 at 6:39am PST 
Salman Khan and John Abraham are seen wooing Bebo till Shahid enters, and whisks her away. Ahh, nostalgia!! Photo credits: Instagram / BCCL
